resources.string:
This is Geoss2Go. For more information, visit the homepage.

This application has been developed within the MyGEOSS project , which has received funding from the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme.

To unleash the power of this app you need to install also the digital field mapping app Geopaparazzi. To do so, click here.

To create a new profile simply push the plus button on the upper right corner.

For a complete tutorial about the usage of Geoss2Go visit this page.
